post_message: "I first would like to register my opposition and my objection to the chairman beating up on a woman, on our witness today, for making a good salary," Rep. Carolyn Maloney at today's Planned Parenthood hearing. "The entire time I've been in Congress, I've never seen a witness beaten up and questioned about their salary. Ms. [Cecile Richards] heads a distinguished organization providing health care services to millions of Americans. I find it totally inappropriate and discriminatory."
